headline: Jim Cramer on Dow Inc.: “I Would Hold on to That”
summary: Dow Inc. (NYSE:DOW) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently talked about. A caller asked if the stock is “back in”, and here’s what Mad Money’s host had to say in response: “Alright, that last quarter was good. That last quarter, Jim Fitterling put up a good quarter.
